definition: to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Fried mutton fat with onions goes well with vodka.
sentences.chinese: 油炸肥羊肉伴洋蔥，再加上一杯伏特加就是絕配了。

sentences.english: Small batch vodka alembic distilled from local grain and the spring water.
sentences.chinese: 這種限量伏特加採用當地的穀物和泉水釀造。

sentences.english: And now you're saying there are two bottles of vodka in it.
sentences.chinese: 現在你又說有兩瓶伏特加酒在裏面。

sentences.english: Viktor served us a lot of vodka.
sentences.chinese: 維克托向我們提供了很多伏特加。

sentences.english: The majority of the world's vodkas are distilled from what product?
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多數伏特加是由什麼釀製而來的？

sentences.english: You stop counting cows and open another bottle of Vodka.
sentences.chinese: 你放棄數牛了，開另一瓶伏特加繼續喝。

sentences.english: Use Coffee flavoured Vodka, or a drop of Kahlua, Garnish with Coffee bean.
sentences.chinese: 使用咖啡味伏特加，少許卡魯瓦，飾以咖啡豆。

sentences.english: To increase its life add 1 teaspoon vodka.
sentences.chinese: 加1茶匙伏特加可以延長保存期限。
莫斯科人善飲伏特加酒。

sentences.english: Your Vodka can wait, my good Alexi.
sentences.chinese: 我的好亞歷斯，你的伏特加在等你。

sentences.english: Add the vodka and lime juice, stir and top with ginger beer.
sentences.chinese: 隨後加入伏特加和青檸檬汁，攪拌均勻後用姜啤續杯。

sentences.english: Our vodka is hand crafted by our master distiller in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 愛斯福斯冰狐伏特加在美國由釀酒師手工做成。

sentences.english: Place ice into a tumbler, add Vodka and Kahlua, stir.
sentences.chinese: 平底大玻璃杯中加入冰，伏特加酒。

sentences.english: Mix Vodka And Cointreau with Ice in a shaker and pour into a tall glass. Add the 7-Up to taste.
sentences.chinese: 混合伏特加酒及君度搖盪後入高杯，加入七喜至八分。

sentences.english: Bulid the vodka and kahlua over ice and top up with cola.
sentences.chinese: 加冰塊添加伏特加和卡魯瓦，注入適量可樂。

sentences.english: Mix vodka and cointreau with ice in a shaker and pour in to a tall glass. add the7-up to taste.
sentences.chinese: 混合伏特加酒及君度搖盪後入高杯，加入七喜至八分。

definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
